functions.tag: {tmw:{id:601,type:5002},display:{Name:'{"text":"魔法の弾丸","color":"blue","italic":false}',Lore:['[{"text":"望む場所に命中する弾丸のペンダント","color":"gray","italic":false}]','[{"text":"ストーリーテラーの射手が身に着けていた","color":"gray","italic":false}]','[{"text":"装備時、魔弾の射手のクールタイムが減少し","color":"aqua","italic":false}]','[{"text":"７発目の対象にエンティティが優先される","color":"aqua","italic":false}]','[{"text":"---------- Inventory ----------","color":"yellow","bold":true,"italic":false}]','[{"text":"  ■□□□□□□□□  指定のスロットに入れると","color":"yellow","bold":true,"italic":false}]','[{"text":"  □□□□□□□□□  効果が発動するタイプの","color":"yellow","bold":true,"italic":false}]','[{"text":"  □□□□□□□□□  装飾品です","color":"yellow","bold":true,"italic":false}]','[{"text":"------------------------------","color":"yellow","bold":true,"italic":false}]']}}
